de.polygonal.ds.DLLNode<T>

type
class

A doubly linked list node.

Each node wraps an element and stores a reference to the next and previous list node.

DLLNode objects are created and managed by the DLL class.

Constructor

new(x : T, list : DLL<T>)

parameters
x the element to store in this node.
list the list storing this node.

Instance Variables

next : DLLNode<T>

The next node in the list being referenced or null if this node has no next node.

prev : DLLNode<T>

The previous node in the list being referenced or null if this node has no previous node.

val : T

The node's data.

Instance Methods

inline append(node : DLLNode<T>) : DLLNode<T>

returns
the list's new tail node.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError node is null or managed by a list.
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError node.next exists (debug only).
Appends node to this node assuming this is the tail node of a list.
Useful for updating a list which is not managed by a DLL object.
Example:

	  var a = new DLLNode<Int>(0, null);
	  var b = new DLLNode<Int>(1, null);
	  var tail = a.append(b);
	  trace(tail.val); //1
	  trace(tail.prevVal()); //0

inline appendTo(node : DLLNode<T>) : DLLNode<T>

returns
the list's new tail node.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError node is null or managed by a list (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError node.next exists (debug only).
Appends this node to node assuming node is the tail node of a list.
Useful for updating a list which is not managed by a DLL object.
Example:

	  var a = new DLLNode<Int>(0, null);
	  var b = new DLLNode<Int>(1, null);
	  var tail = b.appendTo(a);
	  trace(tail.val); //1
	  trace(tail.prevVal()); //0

free() : Void

Destroys this object by explicitly nullifying all pointers and elements for GC'ing used resources.
Improves GC efficiency/performance (optional).

inline getList() : DLL<T>

The list that owns this node or null if this node is not part of a list.

inline hasNext() : Bool

Returns true if this node points to a next node.

inline hasPrev() : Bool

Returns true if this node points to a previous node.

inline isHead() : Bool

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError node is not managed by a list (debug only).
Returns true if this node is the head of a list.

inline isTail() : Bool

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError node is not managed by a list (debug only).
Returns true if this node is the tail of a list.

inline nextVal() : T

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError next node is null (debug only).
Returns the element of the next node.

inline prepend(node : DLLNode<T>) : DLLNode<T>

returns
the list's new head node.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError node is null or managed by a list.
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError node.prev exists (debug only).
Prepends node to this node assuming this is the head node of a list.
Useful for updating a list which is not managed by a DLL object.
Example:

	  var a = new DLLNode<Int>(0, null);
	  var b = new DLLNode<Int>(1, null);
	  var head = b.prepend(a);
	  trace(head.val); //0
	  trace(head.nextVal()); //1

inline prependTo(node : DLLNode<T>) : DLLNode<T>

returns
the list's new head node.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError node is null or managed by a list (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError node.prev exists (debug only).
Prepends this node to node assuming node is the head node of a list.
Useful for updating a list which is not managed by a DLL object. Example:

	  var a = new DLLNode<Int>(0, null);
	  var b = new DLLNode<Int>(1, null);
	  var head = a.prependTo(b);
	  trace(head.val); //0
	  trace(head.nextVal()); //1

inline prevVal() : T

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError previous node is null (debug only).
Returns the element of the previous node.

toString() : String

Returns a string representing the current object.

inline unlink() : DLLNode<T>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError list is null (debug only).
Unlinks this node from its list and returns node.next.
